Parameters: int: The previous state of the channel
int: The new state of the channel.
ParcelFileDescriptor: The Parcel File Descriptor when the channel state is connected.
int: The id associated with the channel. This id will be used in future calls like when disconnecting the channel.
onHealthChannelStateChange(android.bluet.Description: Health Device Profile (HDP) and MCAP protocol are no longer used. New apps should use Bluetooth Low Energy based solutions such as @B_android#bluetooth#BluetoothGatt_E@, @B_android#bluetooth#BluetoothAdapter#listenUsingL2capChannel_E@, or @B_android#bluetooth#BluetoothDevice#createL2capChannel_E@ Callback to inform change in channel state. Its the responsibility of the implementor of this callback to close the parcel file descriptor when done. This callback is called on the Binder thread (not the UI thread)
onHealthChannelStateChange(android.bluet.history: Added in API level 14 Deprecated in API level 29
onHealthChannelStateChange(android.bluet.FullName: public void onHealthChannelStateChange (BluetoothHealthAppConfiguration config, BluetoothDevice device, int prevState, int newState, ParcelFileDescriptor fd, int channelId)

Parameters: int: Success or failure of the registration or unregistration calls. Can be one of @B_android#bluetooth#BluetoothHealth#APP_CONFIG_REGISTRATION_SUCCESS_E@ or @B_android#bluetooth#BluetoothHealth#APP_CONFIG_REGISTRATION_FAILURE_E@ or @B_android#bluetooth#BluetoothHealth#APP_CONFIG_UNREGISTRATION_SUCCESS_E@ or @B_android#bluetooth#BluetoothHealth#APP_CONFIG_UNREGISTRATION_FAILURE_E@
onHealthAppConfigurationStatusChange(and.Description: Health Device Profile (HDP) and MCAP protocol are no longer used. New apps should use Bluetooth Low Energy based solutions such as @B_android#bluetooth#BluetoothGatt_E@, @B_android#bluetooth#BluetoothAdapter#listenUsingL2capChannel_E@, or @B_android#bluetooth#BluetoothDevice#createL2capChannel_E@ Callback to inform change in registration state of the health application. This callback is called on the binder thread (not on the UI thread)
onHealthAppConfigurationStatusChange(and.history: Added in API level 14 Deprecated in API level 29
onHealthAppConfigurationStatusChange(and.FullName: public void onHealthAppConfigurationStatusChange (BluetoothHealthAppConfiguration config, int status)

ClassDesc: Health Device Profile (HDP) and MCAP protocol are no longer used. New apps should use Bluetooth Low Energy based solutions such as @B_android#bluetooth#BluetoothGatt_E@, @B_android#bluetooth#BluetoothAdapter#listenUsingL2capChannel_E@, or @B_android#bluetooth#BluetoothDevice#createL2capChannel_E@ This abstract class is used to implement @B_android#bluetooth#BluetoothHealth_E@ callbacks.
